quote: What gets measured gets improved. – Robin Sharma
fact: Count the number of cricket chirps in a 15-second period, add 37 to the total, and your result will be very close to the actual outdoor Fahrenheit temperature.
joke: Why did the man run around his bed? Because he was trying to catch up on his sleep!
